options.text: wake up your mate, still knocked down next to you.

text: You’re sitting in a spaceship, surrounded by floating digital controls. On the screen in front of you, there is a small photograph of Earth attached with tape. Through the window, you see only the vast expanse of space and a potentially threatening alien spaceship next to theirs. You feel blood running through his forehead, as if you just had a concussion and the spaceship was on automatic pilot. Now, you've taken charge again.

options.text: check for any broken pieces or malfunction
wake up your mate, still knocked down next to you.

text: Now you inspect the ship's systems and equipment to see if anything is damaged or not working properly. After running a diagnosis test you realize that almost everything's in order but there's a room downstairs with a possible leak. Could be nothing, could be something. Do you check?

options.text: Yes: A pipe was disconnected, not important but you lost time. You go back to the control.
No: You see the alarm still off, but ignore it for now.

text: Ignoring the red lights, you quickly set course to the nearest human fleet.

text: She’s wakes up scared and at the sight of the alien spaceship next to you, she immediately takes charge of the situation. “How come we’re still here? They’re charging at us again”. You are frustrated but follow her lead.
